This web application processes, combines, and validates student quiz report from [SELECx](http://selecx.si.mahidol.ac.th) (Siriraj E-Learning and Education Community).

The details in Thai languages can be found [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1F4Sbdz6TAYDq9YloOJOFm4eht5524166LGGfW_5GRGU/edit?usp=sharing).
